name: Vriprix the Mad Wizard
description: Vriprix the Mad Wizard bids the desperate, brave, and foolish to venture into the ruins. Sells Items at full price, buys Items at half price (rounded down).

name: Hogs Head Inn
description: Trading post with upgradeable facilities. Available from Chapter 2 onwards. Buys items at half price.

name: The Merchant
description: A shadowy figure who approaches you on your way back to Vriprix's castle. Buys for 1 Gold more than Vriprix, sells for 1 Gold less (minimum 1 Gold). Has random limited inventory. RISK: D20 roll each visit, on 1 you're caught!
riskPenalty: One of your models gains the Lost Limb Injury
secondRiskPenalty: Vriprix refuses to deal with you until a member of your warband is sent away! Replace that member with a new one. The Merchant then stops dealing with you.
